content.body: In https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#steps-to-expose-a-media-resource-specific-text-track, under MPEG-4, there are a couple occurrences of roughly "the concatenation of A, B, and C, or D if condition". It's unclear what the 'scope' of the "or" is. Is it (A+B+C) or (D)? Or is it A+B+(C or D)?
I looked for how browsers implemented that paragraph, but haven't yet found one that does.
* I looked for how browsers implemented that MPEG-4 paragraph, but haven't yet found one that does.

m.new_content.body: I looked for how browsers implemented that MPEG-4 paragraph, but haven't yet found one that does.

content.body: Looks like Hixie added it in 2012 (d485159e) and it hasn't been touched much since then.
I have an open PR that I need to get back to to clean up that algorithm a bit, but I don't touch that part
